sentence.Network_en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

sentence.Network_en: A string of five rowing boats set out from the opposite bank.
sentence.Network_cn: 5只划艇排成一行从对岸出发了。

sentence.Network_en: All the rowing boats were chained up.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的划艇都用铁链拴了起来。

entry.def: Rowing is a sport in which people or teams race against each other in boats with oars.

example.ex: ...competitions in rowing, swimming and water skiing.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of rowing as a sport
